item.description: New on #MENAdoc: HidÄya-i fÄrsÄ« (4 volumes, Kolkata 1807-1808) https://t.co/c8lKTZi46n This legal Hanafi manual was printed in its Persian translation by British colonial authorities and played a key role in the standardisation in what came to be known as "Anglo-Muhammadan law". https://t.co/aucFLj7ofR
